text: Sano chisimu Haruna ŵaliji ali ŵasalile kala ŵanganyao yanti: “E ŵandu ŵangu! Chisimu ŵanganyammwe m’bwatanganyisyidwe (chikulupi chenu) ni kalakweka. Sano chisimu M’mbuje gwenu ni (Allah) Jwaukoto wejinji; basi munguyani une (pakun’galagatila Allah), ni nkunde lilamusi lyangu (lyakunnekasya kukagalagatila kasanamuka).”
